issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem isn't valid and it can't be fixed.
resolution.name: Invalid

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: storm-core
components.description: Core storm daemons and APIs including trident

comments.body: I am closing this issue because it appears to be JZMQ specific, and apache storm no longer supports JZMQ directly.  You may want to open up an issue under https://github.com/ptgoetz/storm-0mq as that is where Taylor is maintaining a copy of the zeromq transport layer.
